channel.title: Obsidian on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Obsidian on Deuts Log

item.title: Did I Make a Mistake Trusting Resilio Sync for File Syncing?
item.description: After encountering a "No tracker connection available" issue, I’m reevaluating Resilio Sync’s reliability and whether my decision to use it over Syncthing was the right one.

item.title: Building an Efficient Blogging Workflow with Hugo, Obsidian, and GitHub Pages
item.description: Exploring Hugo, Obsidian and Github Pages as a flexible and efficient blogging setup, focusing on low dependency and high control, with a look at potential WordPress migration challenges.

item.title: Hugo and Obsidian workflow
item.description: Highlights of issues with Obsidian plugins like Hugo Publish and Static Site MD Exporter when used in a Hugo blogging workflow.
